price: Tàbí wọ́n ní ọlọ́hun kan lẹ́yìn Allāhu ni? Mímọ́ ni fún Allāhu tayọ n̄ǹkan tí wọ́n ń fi ṣẹbọ sí I.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
